title: residence插件权限设置
author: c123
txt_content:
只有服主能圈地
其他人用斧子只能当工具
权限节点添加了
会是前置插件WorldEdit的原因吗？
代码如下

 Default:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - essentials.build.*
    - essentials.warp
    - essentials.warp.list
    - quickshop.create.buy
    - quickshop.create.changeprice
    - quickshop.create.double
    - quickshop.create.find
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - quickshop.use
    - residence.chatcolor
    - residence.chatkick
    - residence.compass
    - residence.contact
    - residence.contract
    - residence.contract.subzone
    - residence.create
    - residence.create.expand
    - residence.create.expand.subzone
    - residence.create.subzone
    - residence.delete
    - residence.rename
    - residence.resize
    - residence.select
    - residence.subzone

replies.author: wshycaa
replies.txt_content: 你应该在config里设置圈地工具ID，residence默认的圈地工具应该是木锄，但是WE选的也是可以的

replies.author: 湘A:666666
replies.txt_content:
圈地工具是木锄。这个文件中可以配置的！

不需要给什么权限的。斧头是管理员创世纪用的！
